title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 4 GOP Senators join Democrats to rebuke Trump on tariffs for a third time this week

items.title: Trial set over NPR allegations that CPB yielded to White House pressure

items.title: A judge is set to decide whether SNAP benefits can be cut off on Saturday

items.title: Trump administration sets lowest-ever cap on refugee admissions to U.S.
items.description: The lowest cap on refugees since the program was established in 1980 comes as the U.S. prioritizes resettling Afrikaners from South Africa.

items.title: Teacher who was shot by 6-year-old student at school testifies she thought she had died
items.description: A former Virginia teacher who was shot by a 6-year-old student in 2023 says she thought she died that day.

items.description: The capture of Pokrovsk could unlock Russian efforts to seize the rest of the Donetsk region.

items.title: 'The bodies just kept coming' - photographer at deadly Rio police raid
items.description: A witness says residents brought down body after body - some mutilated - after the massive police raid which has left at least 120 dead.

items.title: Satellite images show Jamaica before and after Hurricane Melissa
items.description: Hurricane Melissa made landfall along Jamaica's southwestern coast Tuesday as an extremely powerful Category 5 storm.

items.title: Trump caps refugee admissions at record low - with most to be white South Africans
items.description: The president sets the limit at 7,500 for the coming year, a dramatic cut from 125,000.

items.description: The US president and his Chinese counterpart met face-to-face for the first time in six years.

items.title: The 2025 U.S government shutdown, by the numbers
items.description: The 2025 federal government shutdown, in the first year of Trump's second term, is one of the longest in U.S. history.

Prince Andrew stripped of titles and must surrender lease to Windsor mansion
items.description: Prince Andrew is being stripped of his titles and must surrender his lease to Royal Lodge, according to a statement from Buckingham Palace.

items.title: Sudan RSF chief promises investigation as anger mounts over el-Fasher killings
items.description: The announcement comes after growing reports of mass killings, including of patients at a hospital.
